content.subject: Request for Quotation: Office Supplies
content.body_html:
Dear Vendor,

We are looking to purchase the following office supplies:

  • 50 units of A4 Paper (500 sheets)
  • 20 packs of Blue Ballpoint Pens
  • 10 Ink Cartridges for HP 4100

Please provide a formal quotation including delivery timelines and bulk pricing.

Regards,
ACME Procurement Team
